metadata.name: The 12th Planet - Mother 01
metadata.description:
The planet Nibiru had its atmosphere damaged due to being exposed to solar storms and they used gold to repair their planet's atmosphere.
They realized that there was enough gold in the earth to restore their planet's atmosphere, so the king of the gods sent his two sons and a daughter to the earth with some workers to mine the gold and send it to Nibiru. Later, the workers rioted because of the hard work
Enki and his sister (Ninmah) decided created Cromagnon humans by genetic manipulation of Neanderthal humans, and later by interbreeding Anunnaki and humans, a more intelligent human that is today's human (Homo sapiens) was born.

This character is hand-drawn and digital painted.
Music & Sound design by Pedram jamadi
Resolution 2483 x 2483
